imgSrc: What Your Tombstone Will Say When You Die.png
title: What Your Tombstone Will Say When You Die?

result.title: Your tombstone will say..."Died from not forwarding that email to 10 people"
result.text: You're not the superstitious type, but it looks like not forwarding that chain letter may have cost you your life.
result.imgSrc: Died from not forwarding that email to 10 people.png

result.title: Your tombstone will say..."BRB"
result.text: You believe in reincarnation, which is why your tombstone says: "Be right back".

result.title: Your tombstone will say..."I will not be back after this message"
result.text: You believe that when you're dead...you're dead so you won't be returning any messages from now on.
result.imgSrc: I will not be back after this message.png

questions.question: If you had to choose, how would you wanna die?

options.text: "Life is like a box of chocolates"
"Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it"
"The most difficult thing in life is to know yourself"
